title: Journalist: It's Not Islam That Inspires U.K.'s Young Jihadis
teaser: The killing of reporter James Foley has brought to light the trend of radicalized U.K. citizens going to fight in Syria and Iraq. NPR's Linda Wertheimer talks to the Huffington Post UK's Mehdi Hasan.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
